SEARCH
Package com.gcu.carstoreapplication.data

Class UserDataService

java.lang.Object
com.gcu.carstoreapplication.data.UserDataService
All Implemented Interfaces:
DataAccessInterface<UserModel>
@Service public class UserDataService extends Object implements DataAccessInterface<UserModel>
Service class that provides data access for UserModel using JDBC and Spring's JdbcTemplate.
